decisions.description: Has the primary Billing or Shipping address change
decisions.name: Primary_Billing_Address_Changed
decisions.label: Primary Billing Address Changed

Flow.description: Updates the Account Addresses when a change is made to the primary Billing or Shipping address

formulas.description: Creates the full Billing Address for the Netherlands
formulas.name: forT_DutchBillingAddressStreetCombination
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Letter__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number__c}& {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Letter__c}&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c})), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Letter__c}) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number__c}& {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Letter__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number__c}&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Letter__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Letter__c}) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.House_Number__c}, ""))))

formulas.description: Creates the full PO Box or Freepost Billing Address for the Netherlands
formulas.name: forT_DutchPOBoxFreepostBillingAddressStreetCombination

formulas.description: Used for Dutch addresses. It comprises of the full address for the Shipping Address.
formulas.name: forT_DutchShippingAddressStreetCombination
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Letter__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number__c}& {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Letter__c}& {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c})), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Letter__c}) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number__c}& {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Letter__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number__c}&{!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Letter__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number_Addition__c}), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Letter__c}) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Street__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.House_Number__c}, ""))))

formulas.description: Used for foreign addresses. It comprises of the full address for the Billing Address.
formulas.name: forT_ForeignBillingAddressStreetCombination
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c})), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Billing_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}) ), "", ""))))

formulas.description: Used for foreign addresses. It comprises of the full address for the Shipping Address.
formulas.name: forT_ForeignShippingAddressStreetCombination
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}&" "&{!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c})), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c})) ), {!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_1__c}), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__r.Address_Line_2__c}) ), "", ""))))

Flow.label: AL - Update Account Addresses

loops.description: Iterate through the previous Primary Billing Account Addresses
loops.name: Iterate_Previous_Primary_Billing
loops.label: Iterate Previous Primary Billing

loops.description: Iterate through the previous Primary Shipping Account Addresses
loops.name: Iterate_Previous_Primary_Shipping

recordLookups.description: Gets the Account Addresses that were primary prior to this change

recordLookups.description: Gets the Account Addresses that were primary prior to this change
recordLookups.name: Get_AccountAddressesShipping
recordLookups.label: Account Addresses - Shipping

recordUpdates.description: Store the updated previous Primary Billing Account Addresses, normally this should only be one
recordUpdates.name: Update_AccountAddressesBilling
recordUpdates.label: Account Addresses - Billing

recordUpdates.description: Store the updated previous Primary Shipping Account Addresses, normally this should only be one
recordUpdates.name: Update_AccountAddressesShipping
recordUpdates.label: Account Addresses - Shipping

subflows.description: Publish the Flow Fault Platform Event.
subflows.name: Subflow_PublishFlowFaultEvent
subflows.label: Publish Flow Fault Event

variables.description: The prior values of the Account's primary Billing and Shipping addresses
variables.name: varR_AccountPriorValues

variables.description: This variable is used to store the Flow Element name if a flow errors.
variables.name: VarT_FlowElement
